title: Strengthening Pedagogical Competencies: Critical Thinking (CT) Enhancement Program Specialized in the Mathematics Domain

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced Mathematical Concept Mastery and Administrative Work Experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Enhanced ability to systematically apply CT skills (analysis, evaluation, reasoning) in mathematical problem-solving processes
Successfully complete over 80% of project tasks resembling real workplace environments using domain-specific CT strategies

In team-based PBL (Project-Based Learning) activities, learners will reflect on at least three peer feedbacks to establish a specific action plan within two weeks, improving at least two stages of the CT (Computational Thinking) process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
